name: Eco Tower
description:
Can you balance the needs of a civilsation and build a sustainable tower for the future?

Pick from the right technologies to avoid the planet drowning in polution. Cleaner tech is harder to build with, though, so choose wisely!

Created at, and winner of, the 48 hour Polish-Swiss game jam of 2021 on 'sustainability'.

Controls:

Click on "Start" to begin the game. Pick one of the three building blocks on the right and drag it into the position you want. Try to build a tower that reaches the top without boiling the earth. Different buildings have different penalties or benefits, and serve as better or worse building materials.

Credits:

  • Wojciech Mięsikowski
  • Nicolò Linder
  • Shanti Kronig
  • Nicolas Hafner
  • Tim White
